participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Determined and passionate about music, often expressing emotions through her art.
participant_1.background: i play the piano and guitar and sing. my parents aren't very supportive of my dream. i also work as a custodian to help pay the bills. my favorite type of music to sing is folk music. i am a musician and hope to make it big some day.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and hardworking, focused on academics and future career aspirations.
participant_2.background: i make straight as in school. i am currently in high school. my current goal is to run a k. when i grow up i want to be a physical therapist. i won homecoming queen this year.

content.text: I am currently in high school.
